Translations.Text: Niscaya ami akase rasicakra srsti karechi ebam take darsakadera jan'ye susobhita kare diyechi.
Ami akasake pratyeka bitarita sayatana theke nirapada kare diyechi.
Kintu ye curi kare sune palaya, tara pascad'dhabana kare ujjbala ulkapinda.
Ami bhu-prsthake bistrta karechi ebam tara upara parbatamala sthapana karechi ebam tate pratyeka bastu suparimitabhabe utpanna karechi.
Ami tomadera jan'ye tate jibikara upakarana srsti karachi ebam tadera jan'ye'o yadera annadata tomara na'o.
Amara kache pratyeka bastura bhandara rayeche. Ami nirdista parimane'i ta abatarana kari.
Ami brstigarbha bayu paricalana kari atahpara akasa theke pani barsana kari, erapara tomaderake ta pana kara'i. Bastutah tomadera kache era bhandara ne'i.
Ami'i jibanadana kari, mrtyudana kari ebam ami'i curanta malikanara adhikari.
Ami jene rekhechi tomadera agragamiderake ebam ami jene rekhechi pascadagamiderake.
Apanara palanakarta'i taderake ekatrita kare anabena. Niscaya tini prajnabana, jnanamaya.
Ami manabake paca kardama theke tairi bisuska thanathane mati dbara srsti karechi.
Ebam jinake era age lu era agunera dbara srjita karechi.
Ara apanara palanakarta yakhana pheresataderake balalenah ami paca kardama theke tairi bisuska thanathane mati dbara srsta ekati manaba jatira pattana karaba.
Atahpara yakhana take thikathaka kare neba ebam tate amara ruha theke phamuka deba, takhana tomara tara samane sejadaya pare yeyo.
Takhana pheresatara saba'i mile sejada karala.
Kintu ibalisa-se sejadakaridera antarbhukta hate sbikrta hala na.
